website_summaries.verdict: This sanitizer can be used to clean a variety of phones and items, but it comes with some durability concerns.
pros: Offers a compact design that includes a charging port and aromatherapy diffuser
Can be used to sanitize other small items that will fit in the unit
UV light kills germs in a six- to eight-minute cleaning cycle
cons: Some smartphones may not fit properly

customer_reviews.title: I can only assume that the unit does what it ...
customer_reviews.text: I can only assume that the unit does what it is supposed to do and cleans the phone. The reason for the 4 star review vs a 5 star is that my phone has a kick stand on the back and the unit does not fit well with that and the case on and the units door bows when I close it.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Callahan

customer_reviews.title: Sanitizer
customer_reviews.text: When I received this item, I was surprised at how extremely lightweight it was. I was expecting something a little more sturdier. Nevertheless, we sterilize our Iphones constantly, the result of Covid-19. Unfortunately, this stopped working within 2 months of use. Amazon immediately replaced - thanks to great customer service. We received this in no time and sterilizing our phones ever day since my husband has to go to his job site. We don't know how we know our phones have been sterilized, but since we put it in the case to be sterilized, we accept the fact that it is. Great little gadget to own and affordable too!
customer_reviews.author: Apples420

customer_reviews.title: could not get it to charge phone
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a sanitizer that charged at the same time. This did not give me any indication that it was charging. It is very thin so the only thing that would fit in it is a thin phone and very little else. Not your eyeglasses or mask etc. Be sure to see how deep the one you order is. The plus was that it really was a beautiful color. The other problem was that it was very hard to open. Don't want to break a nail every time I sanitize. It did talk to me with a woman's voice but I found that annoying. I could return it easily with just printing a label so that was good.
customer_reviews.author: dancing queen

customer_reviews.title: MULTIPLE CLEANING USES
customer_reviews.text: i bought this item to clean my iPhone and other items of bacteria/germs. And then I learned that historically the UV cleansing was used in hospitals to clean bed clothes and other items. Now I used it formy phone, and for my anti-corona virus masks. The only complaint--I wish it was larger.
customer_reviews.author: E.C. Norton

customer_reviews.title: Does it do anything? Do I have to hold the cord?
customer_reviews.text: It’s hard to know if this works right? But this just sat there when I put my phone, in its case in the unit. No lights. No sound. The cord didn’t stay in. I sent it back.
customer_reviews.author: Goose Girl

customer_reviews.title: Different than the older version
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these sanitizers that I bought several years ago. It quit working, so I re-purchased this one. On the plus side, it opens easier than the older one did, and I like the blue color over the white one. On the questionable side: the new one does not beep when you press the button for sanitizing and it does not not beep when it is finished. Also, sanitizing only take 2 minutes instead of 6 minutes. Do I have a lemon?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Garbage
customer_reviews.text: Product is dead after just over two months. The aroma therapy part works, but who cares if that works?! I bought it to clean my phone. Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: J. Wolf

customer_reviews.title: Especially Useful
customer_reviews.text: This sanitizer works very well. We use it for cellphones and small items. Very pleased!
customer_reviews.author: Colorado Cook

customer_reviews.title: Works Nicely
customer_reviews.text: Quiet operation. Love the essential oil function. Phone smells nice when you remove after operation. Cloth that comes with it shines the screen nicely.
customer_reviews.author: JudyAS19

customer_reviews.title: Great for cleaning cell phones
customer_reviews.text: I have bouth several of these for many people that I know for there cell phones!
customer_reviews.author: Norman Fuehner

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last long
customer_reviews.text: After just a few times plugging in and out to move it, this device became inoperable - kept getting stuck on a message, starting to speak on its own, and no longer worked. Save your money,
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I use it for my cell phone and my toothbrush. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: jacqueline l. miller

customer_reviews.title: A great gift for someone who has everything
customer_reviews.text: I have bought one for myself and one for each of my grown sons. Who knows how well it really kills the germs? But it makes me feel like I am doing something to clean my electronic devices and also my keys including those electronic ones.
customer_reviews.author: geckomom

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can keep my phone germ free and smelling good. Great investment.
customer_reviews.author: Linda R. Butler

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: It came in the mail very quick, I love it so much... it sterilizes more then just your phone...
customer_reviews.author: Krea8tiveness0214

customer_reviews.title: Wash Your Phone Free of Bacteria and Viruses
customer_reviews.text: This phone sanitizer gives me peace of mind in this era of the Covid 19 pandemic. I use it every time I come home first thing. Six minutes later my phone is germ virus bacteria free! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Randall Ross

customer_reviews.title: Ehhh....not impressed.
customer_reviews.text: I dont like how dim the lights are and the fact that they are at either end of the phone and not on the lid and underneath where the phone would sit. I feel like it's only going to "maybe" sanitize the top and bottom of the phone, not the actual surface area. Seems cheap and flimsy. If you have a S8, you won't be able to charge it because it doesn't have the correct tip for it. Wanted to like this, but I will be returning it.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie

product_meta.title: Aneforall Portable Phone Cleaner for Smart Phone with Box Package - Blue
feature_bullets: Everyone wash hands everyday, but have you ever thought about your phone?
with built in charging port, this product can and charge the phone at the same time
Wide Uses: Not only suitable for phones, but also fit for iPods, mp3 players, Bluetooth earphones, watches
Great Present & Gift: Great present for birthday, Valentine' s Day, Thanksgiving Day, Christmas, Father' s Day, Mother' s Day and other occasions, special gift for someone who works in health system
